labels.tokenDetailsText: You can generate it in your Crowdin Account Settings
labels.organizationDetailsText: Specify organization domain name (for Crowdin Enterprise only). If you connect Crowdin account, leave the field empty
labels.useStringDetailsText: Use source string for you text component in design
labels.previewStringsDetailsText: Preview translations from Crowdin for strings used in the designs
labels.uploadScreenshotsDetailsText: Send Artboards Screenshots for selected page with tagged strings

details.translationsDetails: Send designs for translations to Crowdin and upload translated copies back to Sketch. Use for translating static pages, like banners and brochures.
details.stringsDetails: Use this mode to work with dynamic designs, including product UI.Get real source texts from Crowdin, use them in your designs, and upload screenshots of the artboards to provide context for translators.
details.addStringIdentifierDetails: A unique identifier of this string (may be used to identify translated text in your application)
details.addStringFileDetails: Select editable file to add new source string into it. You can add source strings only to existing files. Supported formats: CSV, RESX, JSON, Android XML, iOS strings, PROPERTIES.
